hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #2 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Iron Boots#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Front Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #the Giant's Knife#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Barinade#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #the Giant's Knife#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Green Potion Bottle#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Water Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Poacher's Saw#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Deku Shield# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest
